table.name: shipment_stop
table.description: This table stores departure and arrival information about every stop along the way for the life of the shipment (both planned and actual).  The key is both the SHIPMENT_GID and the STOP_NUM.

columns.name: SHIPMENT_GID
columns.description: The GID for the equipment associated to a shipment.

columns.name: STOP_NUM
columns.description: The stop number within the shipment. Stop number = 1 is the pickup stop, and the max (stop number) for a shipment is the delivery stop.

columns.name: LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The location GID for the shipment stop.

columns.name: LOCATION_ROLE_GID
columns.description: The location role GID for the shipment stop (such as port, cross dock, etc.).

columns.name: PLANNED_ARRIVAL
columns.description: The planned date and time of arrival at the stop.

columns.name: ESTIMATED_ARRIVAL
columns.description: The estimated time of arrival at the stop. It represents the up to the minute ETA that takes into account ETA updates. This date is editable by the carrier or load planner and should incorporate any known delays to delivery. It represents to the best of our knowledge, when we expect the shipment to arrive.

columns.name: IS_FIXED_ARRIVAL
columns.description: A Y/N indicator defining the arrival time as fixed and will not be changed on subsequent modification.

columns.name: ACTUAL_ARRIVAL
columns.description: A Y/N indicator defining the arrival time as fixed and will not be changed on subsequent modification.

columns.name: PLANNED_DEPARTURE
columns.description: The planned departure date and time at the stop.

columns.name: ESTIMATED_DEPARTURE
columns.description: The estimated time of departure for the stop. It represents the up to the minute ETA that takes into account ETA updates. This date is editable by the carrier or load planner and should incorporate any known delays to departure. It represents to the best of our knowledge, when we expect the shipment to depart from the stop.

columns.name: IS_FIXED_DEPARTURE
columns.description: A Y/N indicator defining the departure time as fixed and will not be changed on subsequent modification.

columns.name: ACTUAL_DEPARTURE
columns.description: The actual departure date and time at the stop.

columns.name: WAIT_TIME
columns.description: The time the truck or the transportation mode has to wait at the stop.

columns.name: WAIT_TIME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the wait time.

columns.name: WAIT_TIME_BASE
columns.description: The wait time in base units.

columns.name: REST_TIME
columns.description: The time the truck or the transportation mode should take for rest at the stop.

columns.name: REST_TIME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the rest time.

columns.name: REST_TIME_BASE
columns.description: The rest time in base units.

columns.name: DRIVE_TIME
columns.description: The drive time to the stop from the last stop.

columns.name: DRIVE_TIME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for the drive time.

columns.name: DRIVE_TIME_BASE
columns.description: The drive time in base units.

columns.name: DIST_FROM_PREV_STOP
columns.description: The distance from the last stop.

columns.name: DIST_FROM_PREV_STOP_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the distance from previous stop.

columns.name: DIST_FROM_PREV_STOP_BASE
columns.description: The distance from previous stop in base units.

columns.name: ACTIVITY_TIME
columns.description: The time spent at the stop for pickup or delivery.

columns.name: ACTIVITY_TIME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the activity time.

columns.name: ACTIVITY_TIME_BASE
columns.description: The activity time in base units.

columns.name: IS_PERMANENT
columns.description: A Y/N indicator defining the stop as permanent and will not be changed on subsequent modifications.

columns.name: IS_DEPOT
columns.description: A Y/N indicator used to define if the stop is a depot.

columns.name: APPOINTMENT_PICKUP
columns.description: A Y/N indicator defining if the stop requires a pickup appointment.

columns.name: APPOINTMENT_DELIVERY
columns.description: A Y/N indicator defining if the stop requires a delivery appointment.

columns.name: ACCESSORIAL_TIME
columns.description: The sum of the fixed accessorial time for a particular stop.

columns.name: ACCESSORIAL_TIME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The accessorial time unit of measure.

columns.name: ACCESSORIAL_TIME_BASE
columns.description: The accessorial time in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: PARENT_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: If an operational location, such as terminal at a port, is chosen for this stop, the location GID will be copied to this field and the location GID field will contain the operational location.

columns.name: LOCATION_OVERRIDE_GID
columns.description: The location GID defining the location to be used to override the actual location on the stop record.

columns.name: STOP_REQUIREMENT_TYPE
columns.description: Used only for trips.

columns.name: RATE_SERVICE_GID
columns.description: The rate service GID set if the stop times were calculated using the rate service engine.

columns.name: ARBITRARY_TYPE
columns.description: SOURCE or DEST to indicate the type of arbitrary. If null, this stop is not an arbitrary.

columns.name: IS_FIXED_DISTANCE
columns.description: When set to Y, indicates the existence of a user-entered value for the distance from previous stop field.

columns.name: EXT_SEQ_NO
columns.description: The external sequence number for the stop.

columns.name: RUSH_HOUR_TIME
columns.description: The amount of time that the drive time defined on the stop in inside the rush hour window.

columns.name: RUSH_HOUR_TIME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The rush hour unit of measure code.

columns.name: RUSH_HOUR_TIME_BASE
columns.description: The rush hour time in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: VOYAGE_GID
columns.description: The voyage GID.

columns.name: IS_MOTHER_VESSEL
columns.description: Designates a leg as mother vessel to automatically populated header.

columns.name: FLIGHT_INSTANCE_ID
columns.description: The flight instance GID.

columns.name: REPETITION_SCHEDULE_GID
columns.description: The repetition schedule GID if the stop times were calculated from a repetition schedule.

columns.name: STOP_TYPE
columns.description: Define the type of this stop.

columns.name: SLACK_VARIANCE
columns.description: The slack variance.

columns.name: DRIVER_NON_PAYABLE
columns.description: Allows the user to specify that stop is payable or not.

columns.name: REPETITION_SCHED_STOP_NUMBER
columns.description: The repetition schedule stop GID if the stop times were calculated from a repetition schedule.

columns.name: DISTANCE_TYPE
columns.description: L - Loaded, B- Bobtail, D - Deadhead

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: APPOINTMENT_WINDOW_START
columns.description: The appointment window start.

columns.name: APPOINTMENT_WINDOW_END
columns.description: The appointment window end.

columns.name: RATE_DISTANCE_GID
columns.description: The rate distance to be used when finding distance from this stop to next stop. This is done mainly for arbitrary case.

columns.name: ROUTE_CODE_GID
columns.description: The route code to be used when finding distance from this stop to next stop This is done mainly for handling arbitrary case.

columns.name: RUNNING_WEIGHT
columns.description: The running total weight from current stop to next stop.

columns.name: RUNNING_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the running weight column.

columns.name: RUNNING_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The running weight contains the running weight in base units.

columns.name: RUNNING_LENGTH
columns.description: The running total length from current stop to next stop.

columns.name: RUNNING_LENGTH_BASE
columns.description: The running length contains the running length in base units.

columns.name: RUNNING_LENGTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the running length.

columns.name: RUNNING_WIDTH
columns.description: The running total width from current stop to next stop.

columns.name: RUNNING_WIDTH_BASE
columns.description: The running width contains the running width in base units.

columns.name: RUNNING_WIDTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the running width column.

columns.name: RUNNING_HEIGHT
columns.description: The running total height from current stop to next stop.

columns.name: RUNNING_HEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The running height contains the running height in base units.

columns.name: RUNNING_HEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the running height column.

columns.name: LEFT_WIDTH_OOG
columns.description: The left width-wise out of gauge.

columns.name: LEFT_WIDTH_OOG_BASE
columns.description: The left width-wise out of gauge in base units.

columns.name: LEFT_WIDTH_OOG_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the left width out of gauge column.

columns.name: RIGHT_WIDTH_OOG
columns.description: The right width-wise out of gauge.

columns.name: RIGHT_WIDTH_OOG_BASE
columns.description: The right width-wise out of gauge in base units.

columns.name: RIGHT_WIDTH_OOG_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the right width out of gauge column.

columns.name: FWD_LENGTH_OOG
columns.description: The forward length-wise out of gauge.

columns.name: FWD_LENGTH_OOG_BASE
columns.description: The forward length-wise out of gauge in base units.

columns.name: FWD_LENGTH_OOG_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the forward length wise out of gauge column.

columns.name: REAR_LENGTH_OOG
columns.description: The rear length-wise out of gauge.

columns.name: REAR_LENGTH_OOG_BASE
columns.description: The rear length-wise out of gauge in base units.

columns.name: REAR_LENGTH_OOG_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the rear length-wise out of gauge column.

columns.name: PREDICTED_ARRIVAL
columns.description: Denotes the predicted arrival time at the stop.

columns.name: PREDICTED_ARRIVAL_LOW
columns.description: Denotes the predicted arrival time low value at the stop.

columns.name: PREDICTED_ARRIVAL_HIGH
columns.description: Denotes the predicted arrival time high value at the stop.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_VOYAGE_CODE
columns.description: Specifies the number of the voyage as assigned by the carrier that transports the shipments from this stop.

columns.name: APPOINTMENT_DURATION
columns.description: The total appointment duration at the stop.

columns.name: APPOINTMENT_DURATION_BASE
columns.description: The appointment duration in base units.

columns.name: APPOINTMENT_DURATION_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the appointment duration.

columns.name: NFR_STOP_TYPE
columns.description: Defines how or process that NFR stop got added
